answers.answer: I wanted to ask do they call u and tell u if u past or not?
I did 3 hour Saturday it was just long m annoying lol. I gotta call same day.that mine came back extremely low. I missed the phone call so not sure what that means

I failed the first 1,they called me in for the 3 hour & threw it up so they sent me home, called me a couple days after had me come in & pick up my meter & strips so I can check my blood sugar at home now. The woman I seen said if u throw it that is usually a sign u have gestational diabetes cause it's to much sugar.
I failed my 1 hour and they made me take the 3 hour twice and i passed, thank God. Hopefully ull pass!
I failed my first one and passes my second one.. if they don't call you about the results just call them...
Yeah I'm not to concerned because they said I barely failed

they will just want you to modify your diet if it was a barely fail.   My GF failed hers and was told she had GD and they put her on a low carb diet.   she ended up losing 15lbs during the pregnancy and baby was still 9lbs when she was born.  its nothing to worry about.

question: Now they are sending me for a 3 hour one never had to do this with my other daughter who is now 6 some one help so nervous
title: failed my 1 hour glucose test
